titles.title: Family Tax Relief Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide income tax relief for families, and for other purposes.
Family Tax Relief Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Family Tax Relief Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow an additional refundable tax credit for expenses for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment; and (2) increase the dollar limitation on the tax exclusion for employed-provided dependent care assistance payments.
